channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenVPN -- OpenVPN
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenVPN -- OpenVPN

item.title: CVE-2024-28882|2024-07-09T12:19:57.631Z -- openvpn -- openvpn
item.description: OpenVPN from 2.6.0 through 2.6.10 in a server role accepts multiple exit notifications from authenticated clients which will extend the validity of a closing session

item.title: CVE-2023-7235|2024-02-21T10:55:15.487Z -- openvpn -- openvpn
item.description: The OpenVPN GUI installer before version 2.6.9 did not set the proper access control restrictions to the installation directory of OpenVPN binaries when using a non-standard installation path, which allows an attacker to replace binaries to run arbitrary executables.

item.title: CVE-2024-28882|2024-07-08T21:30:24.798Z -- openvpn -- openvpn
item.description: OpenVPN 2.6.10 and earlier in a server role accepts multiple exit notifications from authenticated clients which will extend the validity of a closing session
